title: Elon Musk (Finally) Buys Twitter
description:
After months of speculation and legal wrangling, Elon Musk closes the deal on Twitter and starts by firing its top executives. What does Musk mean when he says free speech should live on Twitter, and will Donald Trump fire up his old account? Plus, listeners ask why U.S. test scores are sliding and whether Republicans will continue supporting Ukraine if they win the midterm elections.

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Paul Gigot, The Wall Street Journal
